title: Elegant Italic?
content:
Can anyone help me identify this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104035857im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sample_3430.jpg)
author: tonymcguigan

comments.content: Quite similar to the omnipresent Adobe Caslon with swash ‘J’ and (not well fitting) ‘v’. Not a perfect match tho.

[Founders Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104035857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/founders-caslon/familytree.html) has some of the details (see the swash J and the alternate v) but isn’t an exact match, too.
It looks like Haas type foundry version from 1940. I've been working on my own interpretation for some time.
It looks like Haas type foundry version from 1940. I've been working on my own interpretation for some time…
